posts.post_content:
If you are playing a pure infect deck, you wouldn't need this. Just kill him with the infect, why are you dilly-dallying with discard anyway? You cant even sac this in response to removal, since you'll need to do combat damage.  
  
If you are playing a discard deck, there are better specters.  
  
  
2/5

posts.post_content:
Looks cute at first, but still sucks. A 1/1 flyer for 3 sucks, even if it got infect. And it's ability is pretty useless too. It would be best to sac it, when you can't deal any damage with him anymore. But since you can only sac it when it deals combat damage, that won't work. Also, it makes sense to sac it when your opponent got alot of poison counters. But when your opponent has a lot of poison counters, and you can keep hitting him with this infect creature, why would you sac it?  
It just doesn't make any sense.
posts.html:

It just doesn't make any sense.

Posted By: Leonidus78 (4/28/2011 8:58:20 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I don't see how infect is just treated like any other brand-name ability, giving its respective creature a mana cost increase of 1, or even 0, when it's a completely game-changing ability. I don't understand why something that gives TWICE as much PERMANENT damage to players, and wither counters to creatures costs as much on a creature as haste or flying.  
  
Let's look at double strike. Granted, it gives the first strike ability plus regular damage, but in terms of player damage, it is essentially the same as infect (except that it's not permanent). Double strike typically increases the cost of a creature by 2x its power, and is extremely rare and very carefully balanced when given to creatures. Now let's look at infect. It's given to every creature left and right, common or rare, big or small, like a cheap wh0re dishing out blowjobs. When dealt to a player, infect deals PERMANENT damage, and essentially deals double the damage, along with the wither 'side-effect'... for the very pricey a... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Posted By: DeathDark (6/26/2011 5:51:11 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Slap a [Lashwrithe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lashwrithe) and watch the cards fall out of your opponent's hand.  
  
T1: Swamp, Your choice of discard spell  
T2: Swamp, [Plague Stinger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Plague Stinger)  
T3: Swamp, [Whispering Specter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispering Specter)  
T4: Swamp, [Lashwrithe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lashwrithe), pay 4 life, swing for a potential full hand dump  
  
This card isn't anywhere near as bad as some say, but it's definitely not the sexy choice, especially with [Phyrexian Crusader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Crusader) the go to 3 drop. I run a mono black infect deck that runs a lot of hand disruption and when I connect with my Specter it usually empties the rest of their hand. In the right deck he can fly pretty high.  
  
3.5/5
posts.html:
Slap a Lashwrithe and watch the cards fall out of your opponent's hand.

T1: Swamp, Your choice of discard spell
T2: Swamp, Plague Stinger
T3: Swamp, Whispering Specter
T4: Swamp, Lashwrithe, pay 4 life, swing for a potential full hand dump

This card isn't anywhere near as bad as some say, but it's definitely not the sexy choice, especially with Phyrexian Crusader the go to 3 drop. I run a mono black infect deck that runs a lot of hand disruption and when I connect with my Specter it usually empties the rest of their hand. In the right deck he can fly pretty high.

3.5/5

posts.post_content:
Wow, why is this card rated this low? This guy is a beast!  
  
In my UB proliferate/infect deck this baby can go something like this:  
  
T1: Swamp, whatever  
T2: Swamp, [Trigon of Rage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Trigon of Rage)  
T3: Island, [Whispering Specter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispering Specter)  
T4: Pump it with Trigon of Rage, hit for 4 poison, sac it and opponent discards 4 cards. GG! And I still have a U mana open for [Turn Aside](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Turn Aside) in case my opponent goes for removal  
  
If thats not a game ender I don't know what is....
